title: taking offers on my 19th and early 20th C. packs/labels
author: 1880nonsports

posts.post_title: taking offers on my 19th and early 20th C. packs/labels
posts.post_content: NOT looking to sell anything individually. If you are interested in all of them or a complete segment (ie. all the labels, only but all of the 19th, etc..) - we might come to terms. I haven't thought this through - but right now only entertaining offers. I took pix of everything and will answer questions for serious buyers (or even a tire kicker or two :-).
Tire kicker/lookie loo - but I would love to see them

I can never understand why people just don't post pictures of stuff they are interested in moving...

Doug "just sayin'..." Goodman

[quote name="doug.goodman" post=2086842]I can never understand why people just don't post pictures of stuff they are interested in moving...

Doug "just sayin'..." Goodman[/QUOTE

Henry-Could you please send me images of the 19th century stuff (oldjudge@gmail.com)

Thanks—Jay

sometimes people have reasons for the things they do that might not be clear to others. I'm in negotiation and the buyer might not want such an open posting. Doesn't make me a bad person does it?

In any event the 19th century packs and labels likely spoken for. If no deal is completed I will post the pix here.

To those that responded here or by email - see above.

Jay - hope all is well :-)

[quote name="1880nonsports" post=2086950]sometimes people have reasons for the things they do that might not be clear to others. I'm in negotiation and the buyer might not want such an open posting. Doesn't make me a bad person does it?

In any event the 19th century packs and labels likely spoken for. If no deal is completed I will post the pix here.

To those that responded here or by email - see above.

Jay - hope all is well :-)[/QUOTE]

To be perfectly fair, not that you have to be, I hope you went in order of the requests......
I posted first on the NS side. Just getting it together to respond to the posts here and I will now respond to the messages as well.
I am working on gathering pix/list for some early 20th century packs. I will post them here or on the bay. Thanks for the interest.
